alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:48PM CDT until July 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in southern Illinois... Northern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Alexander County in southern Illinois... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cape Girardeau, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anna, Jonesboro, Cobden, Dongola, Tamms, Ware, Ullin, Thebes, New Grand Chain, Pulaski, Mill Creek and East Cape Girardeau. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 14 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
